law.text: [Text of section effective until July 1 preceding the opening of the Essex North Shore agricultural and technical school. Repealed by 2004, 463, Sec. 1. See 2004, 463, Sec. 18 as amended by 2010, 130, Sec. 7.] The department of education may adopt regulations for the operation, maintenance, improvement and development of independent agricultural and technical schools.
